meanings.definition: The act of canceling or annulling.
meanings.sent1: The cancelations of the event disappointed many people.
meanings.sent2: The airline had to make several cancelations due to bad weather.
meanings.sent3: The cancelations of the party left everyone feeling let down.
meanings.sent4: The cancelations of the show were like erasing all the excitement.
meanings.sent5: The cancelations of the orders were like hitting the reset button.

meanings.definition: The state of being canceled or annulled.
meanings.sent1: The cancelations of the service caused inconvenience to customers.
meanings.sent2: The cancelations of the memberships led to a decrease in revenue.
meanings.sent3: The cancelations of the game made the players feel rejected.
meanings.sent4: The cancelations of the contract felt like a sudden end to the partnership.
meanings.sent5: The cancelations of the plans left a sense of emptiness in the air.
